org.bson.codecs.pojo

Class FieldModelBuilder<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bson.codecs.pojo.FieldModelBuilder<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the field

    public final class FieldModelBuilder<T>
extends Object
    A builder for programmatically creating FieldModels.
    Since:
    3.5
    See Also:
    FieldModel
